pageContext.title: In brief: Go-Jek pilots food-delivery service in Vietnam
pageContext.content:
Just a couple of months after its launch in Vietnam, Go-Viet has started the pilot program for its food-delivery service. The Go-Food pilot began in Ho Chi Minh City and is expected roll out across major cities in the country soon, said Nguyen Bao Linh, deputy head of business development at Go-Viet.

Source: DealStreetAsia

seo.title: In brief: Go-Jek pilots food delivery service in Vietnam
seo.description: Go-Viet’s Go-Food started its pilot in Ho Chi Minh City.
